title: Reinstate a Lapsed Policy
description: A customer's auto policy was cancelled for non-payment, and they are calling a few days later to reinstate it.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their recently cancelled policy.
Check if the policy is eligible for reinstatement without a lapse in coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is within the reinstatement eligibility window.

tasks.description: Take the back-payment for the overdue premium and process the reinstatement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes the payment and successfully reinstates the policy with no lapse.
